processingCommand.script:
! Prepare incident status
:IF &INSTALL_EXTENSION_STATUS# = "true"
:  SET &TMP#                   = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CTASK_CLOSE_NOTES", 1)
:  RESOLVE &CTASK_CLOSE_NOTES# = "&TMP#"
:  SET &CTASK_CLOSE_STATE#     = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CTASK_CLOSE_STATE", 1)
:  SET &CTASK_CLOSE_CODE#      = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CTASK_CLOSE_CODE", 1)

:  SET &TMP#                   =  GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_CLOSE_NOTES", 1)
:  RESOLVE &RFSC_CLOSE_NOTES#  = "&TMP#"
:  SET &RFSC_CLOSE_CODE#       = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_CLOSE_CODE", 1)
:  SET &RFSC_CLOSE_STATE#      = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_CLOSE_STATE", 1)
:  SET &RFSC_SPL_CLOSURE_CODE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_SPL_CLOSURE_CODE", 1)
:  SET &RFSC_CLOSE_COMMENTS#   = ""
:ELSE
:  SET &TMP#                   = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CTASK_CLOSE_NOTES_FAILED", 1)
:  RESOLVE &CTASK_CLOSE_NOTES# = "&TMP#"
:  SET &CTASK_CLOSE_STATE#     = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CTASK_CLOSE_STATE_FAILED", 1)
:  SET &CTASK_CLOSE_CODE#      = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CTASK_CLOSE_CODE_FAILED", 1)

:  SET &TMP#                   =  GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_CLOSE_NOTES_FAILED", 1)
:  RESOLVE &RFSC_CLOSE_NOTES#  = "&TMP#"
:  SET &TMP#                   =  GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_CLOSE_COMMENTS_FAILED", 1)
:  RESOLVE &RFSC_CLOSE_COMMENTS#  = "&TMP#"
:  SET &RFSC_CLOSE_CODE#       = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_CLOSE_CODE_FAILED", 1)
:  SET &RFSC_CLOSE_STATE#      = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_CLOSE_STATE_FAILED", 1)
:  SET &RFSC_SPL_CLOSURE_CODE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INST-EXTENSION.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_SPL_CLOSURE_CODE_FAILED", 1)
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &CTASK_CLOSE_NOTES#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &CTASK_CLOSE_STATE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &CTASK_CLOSE_CODE#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &RFSC_CLOSE_NOTES#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RFSC_CLOSE_CODE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RFSC_CLOSE_STATE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RFSC_CLOSE_COMMENTS#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RFSC_SPL_CLOSURE_CODE#,,WORKFLOW
